climatePledgeFriendly.details: Climate neutral by ClimatePartner certifies the carbon footprint of a product was calculated and all associated emissions were offset.

features: ✔️【Kids Toys with 5 Modes】This Frog Game Toy is an excellent tool for early childhood education and development. It fosters musical abilities, enhances muscle coordination, and improves physical coordination in 3 year old boy. With 5 interactive modes including Pass, Competitive, Memory, Play, and Piano, kids can challenge themselves with 45 levels of increasing difficulty. This makes the toy a perfect choice for nurturing growth and learning, especially as gifts for boys

✔️【Sensitive Counting】The Frog Game Toy is a specifically designed educational toy for 3 year old boys,that makes for great 3 year old boy gifts.Kids can play by gently tapping the "light-up frogs." This action helps to improve strength in their little hands. The game involves hitting frogs with flashing lights to score points and has a two-player mode that parents and kids can enjoy together, fostering a strong parent-child bond. This toy is a great choice for physical and interactive fun!

✔️【Upgraded Design-Spray Function】The upgraded Frog Game Toy now features a spray function that further stimulates kids interest. It automatically sprays upon turning on the toy or passing a level. Kids can select different modes by pressing the switch button, causing the frog to change and glow with a soft, non-dazzling light. This helps to improve their visual, language, and musical sound recognition abilities. When the frog isn't hit, the toy continues to encourage the child to keep playing.

✔️【Adjustable volume】The Frog Game Toy allows you to adjust the sound volume and pause the game according to your surroundings. If not in use for 20 seconds, it enters a power-saving mode and goes to sleep. After 5 minutes of inactivity, the toy will automatically turn off and enter power-saving mode to conserve energy.

✔️【Kids' Holiday Gift Toy】This frog toy is an excellent educational tool and a toddler gifts that can stimulate your child's development. It makes a perfect present for birthdays and Easter toys for toddlers, bringing a delightful grin to their charming little faces. These toys for ages 3-4 are both entertaining and ideal for boys and girls in that age range, and your kids will surely become enamored with this frog toy!

✔️【SAFE MATERIALS】This frog toy is constructed from ABS eco-friendly plastic, making it BPA-free, non-toxic, and environmentally friendly. The accessories have a smooth surface with no sharp edges, ensuring that it will not cause any harm to a baby's delicate skin. It is suitable for toddlers and can be touched, played with, and hugged by them. The toy meets American toy standards and has undergone rigorous safety testing, ensuring that it is safe for your kids to use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Fun whack frog game 2 Friendly Contest 3 Memory Contest 4 Music Contest 5 Piano Contest

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far, very impressed. Great quality and and sturdy construction. Has many levels to choose from. Super simple and fun, whether for a 4 yr old or an adult. Suctions to a solid surface and does not move or come loose when playing. Would definitely recommend this game and will consider as a gift for one of my other grandchildren.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Engaging and Interactive Toddler Fun
reviews.reviewText: As a parent always on the lookout for engaging toys for my toddler, I was thrilled to discover this Game. This interactive toy offers a delightful blend of entertainment and early learning that captivates young minds.This is a fantastic choice for parents seeking a fun, engaging, and educational toy for their toddlers. With its interactive features, multiple modes, and developmental benefits, it's sure to be a hit with both kids and parents alike. I recommend it as a birthday gift or anytime surprise for children aged 3 to 4 and beyond!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for 18 and 24 month olds!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent toy- easily my 18 month old son's fave Xmas present this year, and we got his 2 year old cousin one and he LOVES it also. He doesn't quite understand to hit the lit-up frogs but he has a blast just bashing it anyways. Only thing is the "mist" feature has not worked on ours... not a deal breaker for us but just be aware

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun family game for 1-2 people
reviews.reviewText: Adorable and good quality. 3 year old grandson enjoys it but does need level one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is great when interacting with a 3year old. Concentration, eye hand coordination and helps with speed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and interactive
reviews.reviewText: We loved this game for our autistic son, We all had fun playing together, which is hard to find toys and games that allow us to do that as a family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after 1 day
reviews.reviewText: It's better for a kid over 4 years or you'll have to keep resetting it over and over after each game. About 46 levels and if your kid pushes any button they'll end up losing within seconds and will be back to resetting the came again and again.The screen lights went off and on after a couple of minutes and after an hour it stopped working. Now they turn on when they want to, and you can't see the score.Kids and adults loved it. It's fun but not worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for little hands!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for my 16 month old grandson, and he loves it…but so do my 5, 7, and 10 year old granddaughters!Fun for adults to play with them also!It has many difficulty levels, and keeps score. A great value for the price!
